thread.section_title: Novotel London West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Check In From Hell
thread.title_full: Check In From Hell - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rocknroller99
title: Check In From Hell
text: Seriously? 5.30pm at one of West London's busiest hotels and two staff on reception, both foreign and one of whom was clearly being trained so slower than the Walking Dead. Every check in detail had to be repeated and then spelt out as both receptionists slowly worked through their painful repertoire. I stood patiently, bag in hand like a refugee for 20 minutes before being processed. Imagine my joy when I got to my room (3 minute wait for a lift) to find the key card didn't work so had to return and re-queue. My hotel stay was entirely ruined before I even opened the door .... to a fairly average bedroom
